review_text: Truly enjoyed my stay in this peaceful, beautiful setting. Hope to come back again!!

excellent stay for the price, cant beat it. only downside (if you consider it that) is its not near any restaurants. so definitely eat before arriving! very friendly, clean, comfortable, and spacious.

Absolutely beautiful surroundings, comfy bed and room with pastoral views, lovely host and family, absolutely clean & quiet, yummy fresh eggs right from the chickens for breakfast with great coffee in the morning, and the goats are adorable! You can get there really quick from 83, but I came from the west on amazing backroads from Dresden to their place. It was magical. I’m allergic to dogs but I was fine—their 11 “puppy dogs” are hypoallergenic, super well-behaved, very quiet and clean, stayed out of my room, and were darling. Can’t wait to go back!
Amazing stay for a few days in the farm while I chased the solar eclipse. Being greeted by the oodles of poodles was an added bonus! Friendly family and enjoyed my stay. Thank you!

It was a beautiful setting , loved the house and my room was spacious and comfortable . It was the perfect spot to stop on my way to Virginia. Danielle was very kind to welcome me as I arrived later than planned . I would definitely stay there again
Another pleasant stay at Danielle's, great communication, peaceful area.
Really friendly host!
Friendly hosts, make you feel right at home!
Wonderful stay, I look forward to booking with Danielle again in the future.
I had a fantastic time staying here. I was made to feel very much at home. Chris and Danielle were great hosts, very friendly and even helped me out with a flat tyre on my car.

I had a nice stay at Danielle’s home. Im sure I will go back next fall and stay longer. It’s very quiet and secluded in the country. I had a nice walk around her property. I sat on the porch and enjoy the view with her dogs and she let me park my motorcycle in her garage which I appreciated.
another excellent stay. I'm sure I'll be back again. they have a very lovely farmhouse and very friendly family. they even have a pack of guard poodles to watch over you all night.
beautiful farm home, clean as a whistle!
Very highly recommended.

Danielle and her husband were the best hosts you could ask for. Their home and property is stunning. They are very kind, gracious, and generous. We were just passing through for the night, but I wished we could have stayed a week! It was certainly a delight! (Plus, they have adorable dogs!)

Good parking. Good front porch for sitting and relaxing. Spacious clean house. Good open kitchen, help your self always. Host was friendly, always there but not intrusive. TV in room. Bed and sheets was comfortable. Window AC unit. Room had black out curtains. Quiet clean home through out, quiet place to relax. House on a couple of acres to walk around on with garden, and orchard. Dirt road to walk down.

Kellie is a responsive and helpful hostess: she responded to us very quickly as soon as we had a question and went out of her way to help us. The cottage is ultra clean, very comfortable and extremely well-equipped. Everything smells good and you feel at home! I highly recommend this place!
She was very quick to respond to all of our needs.
Very comfortable place. Nice location. Communication and responsiveness was excellent.
Great place. Clean. Loved all the windows.

My friends and I wanted an easy and short get away. Kellie provided the perfect place for the occasion. It was just like home, very clear instructions and a beautiful property. Amazing hospitality and quick responses. Thank you so much Kellie!

I love staying at Kellie's place while I work at the local hospital. It is spotless, quiet, well-appointed and located an easy drive into Zanesville and to the hospital. I have stayed previously and will be staying several more times in the next two months. I have stayed at 5 places in Zanesville for work and Kellie's is my favorite. It is a great value!

This is our second time staying here and it was just as amazing as our first visit! Kellie thinks of everything and goes the extra mile. We enjoyed eating breakfast and watching the deer pass by the back window. It is very peaceful and has everything you could want.

First of all - the place was set up perfect for my friends and our plans to hunt at near by tri valley wildlife unit. Had all the amenities. Frozen pizza? No problem they have a pizza pan.. forgot spices for the burger, so what they had spices in the cabinet! Clean towels, shampoo and body wash in the shower. Grill on the porch.. perfect. Overall, it was perfect. Nothing more to say..
Thank you for a wonderful evening. Everything was as listed. Would definitely recommend.
Kellie was very communicative and did a great job making sure we had a comfortable stay. The Airbnb was very clean and was in a great location. I would definitely stay here again!
Kellie was a great host and very responsive. 10/10 would recommend!
One of the most considerate hosts I’ve ever stayed with. Perfectly clean and cozy home. We absolutely loved our stay here.

This place was even better than the photos!! So pretty & peaceful! The deck with the fall colors were beautiful! Everything was clean & neat inside with extra little touches!!
I hope to return to solely relax & enjoy next time. Kellie was an amazing host - super responsive & very accommodating!

Nestled in the heart of a charming neighborhood, the Airbnb exceeded all expectations. The cozy, tastefully decorated space exuded warmth and comfort from the moment I stepped in. The host's attention to detail was evident in every corner, from the plush bedding to the thoughtfully curated local recommendations. Mornings were a delight, sipping coffee on the private terrace overlooking a the changing leaves. The location was perfect, every aspect of the stay was seamless, leaving me with cherished memories and a longing to return.

The place was amazing and very comfortable and cozy. Everything was extremely clean and very well decorated. The host was very communicative and provided very clear directions for everything. We loved all the amenities provided and there were lots of things that other places don’t usually have like lots of cookware, spices, bathroom supplies, plenty of blankets, pillows and towels if needed. For the same price as a hotel room in the area you can have a whole place to yourself. Will definitely stay again when in the Zanesville area!
Very nice place and host.

WOW! This the best best night sleep we have ever had while on vacation! The space is amazing! The second we walked in we felt at home. It’s welcoming, comfy, clean, well decorated, and stocked. We loved all of the big windows that let in the sunshine. We didn’t want to leave. Had intended to stay 2 nights, but had to cancel 1 because of work obligations. We would have loved to stay a week. Will be keeping this one on my list for any trips through the area.
I am so happy I came across your cottage. It’s absolutely beautiful. It’s very clean, spacious, and relaxing. Thank you for sharing your home with us. I wish we could have stayed longer!
Fantastic host and amazing location!! Everything was set up perfectly, couldn't have asked for better!!
Fabulous stay. Highly recommended.
One of best airbnb house. So clean, peaceful beautiful place.
Kellie was a amazing host and was very responsive definitely would stay again
It's a great place to relax and not be bothered by the hustle of the world. The river is hard to see from the house. But the kitchen is well equipped and everything was clean. Beds are comfy.
Nice place! Super clean!
We felt right at home, right away! Comfortable beds, some snacks and toys and books for the kids, water in the fridge…everything was spotless! Just what we needed for a quick stop!

This was our first airbnb. My work colleagues recommended finding one to stay at instead of a hotel. This stay definitely made us swear off of hotels in the future. The hosts definitely went out of their way to make our stay fantastic. Not sure how they arranged it, but there were some deer waiting for us next to the house. We wish we could've spent more time there. Maybe sometime in the future. Thank you Kellie and Darin.
Awesome place, will come again!
Such a great place to stay for a weekend. Hosts are very nice and welcoming. Lots of local things to go out and do.
Loved this place ! There is so much space and comfortable bed with treats on the kitchen island. So peaceful with all the comforts of home.

My first time ever staying at an air bnb. Now I don't want to stay in a motel ever again. Our hostess, Kellie, was graciously accomodating. She went out of her way to fulfill our request for an early check in. One can definitely tell Kellie is genuine & truly cares about her guests, making certain her guests feel right at home. If you need a place to stay while visiting Zanesville I highly recommend Riverview Cottage.

We spent a couple of nights at the Riverview Cottage and thoroughly enjoyed our time there! The cottage was perfectly clean and comfortable. Kellie was an excellent hostess, very friendly, helpful and generous-- a true Superhost! Who knew there was so much to do in Zanesville, Ohio?? Kellie had a terrific list of really fun and interesting places to visit in her guidebook. We hit lots of them. We loved having our coffee on the big, private deck and a nice campfire in the side yard fire pit. This is absolutely the most comfortable Airbnb we've stayed at so far!! A real gem!

Extremely cozy, cozy, clean, Keller answers all requests and does everything to satisfy guests.
The place is incredible, very relaxing and soothing.
The interior is very cozy and warm.
We would recommend this listing to relax. With children it is perfect, board games and outdoor games available. Beautiful terrace and garden.

Kellie was an exceptional host! She thought of everything and the little extras made us feel right at home and welcomed! The location is beautiful and fit the description perfectly. It is conveniently located to everything we needed, yet recluse and peaceful for a perfect getaway. We were able to work with Kellie to host family as if we were in our own home!
Clean, welcoming, comfortable, cozy two bedroom place to stay.

The cottage was extremely nice. We felt at home as soon as we entered. Everything we needed was available and Kellie was very approachable and welcoming. It was spotless and Kellie left us some treats and really went above and beyond. She actually brought over some outdoor balls for our grandkids. Our grandkids loved it and asked if we could go back and we definitely will. Kellie gave us great recommendations for things to do in the area and restaurants. Super Host!!
My nephew and I really enjoyed our stay. Kellie is very thoughtful with having pretty much anything you could need, she left a greeting card and then a book with things to do and recommendations.

A wonderful getaway that didn't feel like an overly sanitized, don't touch anything lodging. It also didn't feel like someone else's house with all their belongings. Riverview Cottage made it easy to slip into a routine and feel comfortable enough to relax. Everything was clean and as advertised. Kellie is definitely a super host. Great communication and attention to detail. I think Fall would be absolutely beautiful here.
Kellie is an awesome host. From the time of booking until the time of arrival communication was spot on. Beautiful place. Very clean. Will definitely stay here again. Thanks again Kellie.

We had a great experience! Needed a nice place to stop on the way home with our two little kiddos and this was perfect. Kellie was easy to communicate with and provided a high chair for my infant. Would definitely recommend to anyone needing a place to stay in the area.
Great place! Served our needs perfectly.
Our stay was amazing! The kids enjoyed staying there we will be staying there again! The house was very clean pictures do no justice for how beautiful this home is!
We had a fantastic stay. Very clean and comfy.
We had a great time overall. I enjoyed my stay with the family. I do Wish it was more private and had more to do but it was expected. Thanks again.
Great stay!! Great price!!
We only needed an overnight stay and this place was comfortable and cozy. A great place to relax and unwind.
this was our 2nd stay at Kellie's place. very nice place. would absolutely stay here again. Kellie is great. stay here, you'll love it.

We had a great stay at Kellie’s place! We felt right at home and loved how well organized it was. A lot of care went into making a comforting, welcoming spot.
One member of our family was celebrating his 74th birthday on the day we stayed and Kellie even sweetly left him a birthday greeting note. :) Thank you!

We walked in, dropped our bags, and felt at home. It was so easy to settle in due to everything being accessible from a fully stocked bathroom to plenty of blankets and towels, to a kitchen ready to use. Beds were very comfortable, and it was very peaceful. Our son loved the teddy bear and bedtime books. Very clean place with excellent communication from the host.

We were refreshed by such a wonderful place to stay. Every detail was thought of and provided. Even though excellence was upon this cortage, we felt at home and relaxed. Kellie was extremely helpful and kind if we had any questions. If we are in the area we would definitely stay again.

Kellie’s cottage was absolutely amazing! A true home away from home! We went for the weekend for a music festival and check in super late. The house was soooo comfortable! The bed revived me after an exhausting day! Kellie is responsive and accommodating and even graced us with a slightly later check out as we we dragging after such a long day! Highly recommend booking Kellie’s cottage!

The cottage was charming: welcoming, refreshing and filled with personal touches! Kellie had the cottage stocked with local snacks, cold water bottles, coffee, board games; even a teddy bear and bedtime stories for our young son! Wishing we had time to visit longer! We are grateful for this oasis!
Kellie was a wonderful host and made the visit homey for me and my family. I would happily stay again.

Highly recommend! We had a little adventure with a baby raccoon 😂😂 & had clinicals in Zainesville . The place felt right at at home, it was so cozy and welcoming which was well needed with our busy schedules ! Thank you Kellie !
Beautiful place with woods around the deck. comfy beds and very clean and attractive. Restaurants nearby.

Had a great stay at Kellie's place - was a really great base to explore the area, including local state parks, a fun 10K run, and some great dining and beverage options. Kellie was a great host, making sure had clear instructions and checking in our visit. Location down on the river was quiet and secluded and very relaxing. Recommended!

Kellie's cottage was so nice, so spacious. I am pretty sure it was cleaner than a hospital. the beds are so comfortable. plenty of dishes, and pots and pans. the neighborhood is quiet and peaceful . I can not say enough good things about our stay.
Great cottage, perfect for a getaway!

Tasteful and well laid out;. extras like water and snacks; questions quickly answered; did not intrude on our space, but was there if we needed anything; fragrance free soap available for those allergic to scents. Perfect place to relax on our way to our granddaughter's ballet performance.
We LOVED our stay at Kellies. We enjoyed the quiet neighborhood & the place was so clean. It was a rejuvenating time!!

This is one of our favorite stays so far! We came to stay so we could be closer to The Wilds and it was more than we expected. It had all the comforts of home and we grilled out and relaxed with our two children for the evening. We definitely will return so we can take the pontoon ride on the river and use the fire pit. Kellie was super helpful and the few questions we had, she answered promptly. Can't say enough about this quiet, peaceful get away from the city!
This was a great place. Wonderful host, responsive and great. I would stay here again.

Our very first ever Air B&B experience and Kellie made it truly memorable. There was absolutely everything I needed whenever I thought I forgot something it was there. Very accommodating. The perfect home away from home feeling!!

We enjoyed our overnight stay at Kelllie's place. It was very clean, the bed was comfortable, had all the kitchen items we needed to cook dinner. We went for a little walk in the evening and sat on the deck. We would stay here again next time we are in the area.
Absolutely loved our stay! It was a place away from home. Private and tucked away, yet shopping and adventures weren't far.
Kellie is a fantastic host! She was so nice to work with and the cottage was amazing! I would highly recommend staying here.
Beautiful, peaceful area! The place was nice and open inside. The beds were comfortable. Overall, it was a great place!

Kellie is a very responsive host and you can tell how much she cares about your experience. From entering into the home to a personalized message to checking in to ensure you have everything you need. The cottage is exactly like the pictures and has a nice large deck to enjoy the outdoors. It is very quite and close to a park for the kiddos. Definitely worth the stay and we plan on returning again! 😁

Kelly went above and beyond for us. I accidentally left my wedding ring in the bedroom when we left. Kelly notified me immediately that I left the ring there and kept it safe for me until I was able to return to retrieve it.

The cottage offers a wonderful open floor plan for families. Sizable kitchen with all the amenities you could possibly need. Lovely decorated bedrooms with comfortable mattresses and linens. The cottage was absolutely spotless from top to bottom. Large windows within the main living space brings the outdoor feeling inside. Once you drive off the main road and back into the quaint area where the cottage sits, the dwelling is situated amongst very well maintained houses/cottages. Lovely fire pit area and large deck for morning coffee and reading. Host was very responsive and easy to get in touch with.
Kellie was ALWAYS responsive and accommodating. Went above and beyond to make sure good experience. Felt very homey. Great experience. Would definitely stay again when next in the area.
Kellie is a wonderful host and her cottage was just as pictured. Very clean and comfortable. We felt right at home. Would definitely recommend!
Very clean place. I appreciated the snacks that were left and the coffee assortment. Wish the weather was nicer so could enjoy the deck or firepit

Beautiful, comfortable and quiet cottage! We loved how spacious it was. Thoughtful touches and amenities throughout the space made us feel right at home! Kellie was so responsive and fry. We highly recommend this peaceful place!
Great house and great location. Loved our stay here.

The cottage was cozy and just what we needed. It was spacious and allowed my 1 year old niece to run around. Kellie was a wonderful host and made sure we were right at home. When I’m back in the area I would definitely book again!

The Cottage was beautiful and just what we needed. It was very clean and comfortable. Kellie was fantastic with the communication leading up to our stay and during our stay. It was a great experience and stay!!
Could not be happier! Clean! Comfortable! Quiet! Had everything we needed! Very Responsive and friendly! We will absolutely add this one to our favorites list!!!
Very comfortable, baby friendly home! Kellie is very accommodating if you have small children.

Kellie was very responsive and helpful with accommodating unexpected changes in our travel plans. We hope to stay here when we travel through this area again in the future. She truly is a super host!!!!
Very peaceful and quiet. Couldn’t ask for anything more
Exactly as pictured and described! This airbnb is in a quiet neighborhood. Rooms were each very clean and comfortable. We definitely will return on our future travels!
Nice and and very clean, host was always helpful and kind.
Kellie’s place was fantastic. We walked in and thought the place had a cozy, family feel. Kellie was exceptionally communicative, the digs were super comfortable. I would absolutely stay again

Our family had a great stay! The space was large, clean and well maintained. There were plenty of clean towels and the bedding was very comfortable. The open layout was great for our 1 year old to run around in. He loved looking out the windows and seeing the river. The deck was spacious and it would be great to hang out on in warmer weather. It is a peaceful location. Kellie was extremely accommodating and helpful, providing us with all the information we needed and being available to answer any questions we had. We will definitely stay at Kellie’s cottage when we are in Zanesville next!
Thank you for having us Gregory! We will definitely be back!
amazing cabin and amazing hosts! this air bnb had everything you could ever need. hosts were so sweet and accommodating
Wonderful host, very sweet and very kind! Super helpful and answered all questions whenever I needed help! 100 percent recommend staying!
This cabin is amazing! Very nicely decorated and very clean. Lots of well thought out items to make your experience enjoyable. Highly recommend this cabin.

We absolutely loved staying here. It was a stunning cabin, and the decor was like staying in the luxury Disney themed hotel! The view of the pond from the hot tub made evenings magical and the host was so helpful and responsive! We will be back for sure.

Would easily rate our stay more than 5 stars if possible. There is so much to do. You can spend your whole stay inside looking at small personal touches and playing indoor activities, or spend it outside with plenty of options from the hot tub, fishing, exploring the property, or a fire by the pond. Gregory is a great host, with plenty of local recommendations, and very responsive. There is no details missed with fishing gear, firewood, anything you would possibly need readily available at the cabin. Can’t wait until our next stay.

Amazing! This property is stunning. As soon as I opened the door I was speechless. The interior of the home is so perfect. The touches and accents throughout are spot on. The property is beautiful as well. Quiet area enjoyed hiking and fishing. Our family never left the property there was so much to do. The game room on the lower level kept all ages entertained. I would definitely come back again.

Honestly we loved Gregory’s place. I felt like the pictures didn’t even do it justice. There is so much to do, the house is so big and is a beautiful place. They also go above and beyond for their guest. This is a great stay
This was the most amazing peaceful cabin weve ever stayed at. The host was kind and gracious the cabin beautiful. A perfect home away from home

The only complaint I have is the pictures didn’t do this place justice!! lol!! It was even more beautiful and cozy in person! The attention to detail was nothing short of amazing and the Christmas decor was fabulous! There was even an elf in the shelf hidden in our closet and a lovely card and little gift bags with mugs and hot cocoa for our family of 4! The OSU decor was a bonus (I’m a Buckeye!) and Greg and his wife Erin answered all of our questions promptly. The town of Cambridge is adorable around Christmas and we made a wonderful memory. Can’t say enough positive things about this place.
Awesome place we would and will definitely stay again !

We found this house to be exactly as written in description plus a few extra ingredients. The house was decorated beautifully with Christmas decor all through the home.
We enjoyed the wood burning stove downstairs while playing darts and watching football.
The house had all necessary kitchen appliances and gadgets to make our 7 member family weekend enjoyable.
The coziness of the home helped create a lifetime of memories for our family!

Our host was extremely accommodating beyond expectations. The personal thought that was put into what a guest might need or want was there. The person touch to the game room with Ohio State game time and buckeyes in the fridge was very meaningful to this Buckeye fan. I will be recommending this beautiful place to friends and family for future stays. O-H

If it was possible to give both the host and home 10 stars I would! The absolute BEST host we have ever experienced. They thought of everything. The location is perfected in every single way. Comfortable and cozy! Greg goes above and beyond for his guests. Every single thing about this experience was just perfect! Highly recommend.

What a relaxing wkend. The cabin is beautiful and has everything you need and then some. I loved the personal touches the owners made to cabin. Contacting them was very easy and response was quick. We will be back!!

Our stay couldn’t have been more perfect. We arrived to a cute s’more kit for our twins 12th birthday and homemade Buckeyes in the fridge! There was so many things the kids can do to fishing, ping pong, darts and movie nights! We would definitely recommended this cabin to everyone needing a restful getaway but can have fun too!

Very nice home and fully stocked kitchen & basement with cooking supplies & games & activities.
Appreciated the S’mores Basket! Everything we needed was available for use. Would definitely return & recommend.
Greg thought of everything! My family and I had a wonderful time. I will definitely be recommending to family and friends.

We had a great time at Black Bear. Cabin was clean and fully stocked kitchen made meals easy to cook. Beds were comfortable and there were plenty of sitting options when watching a movie in the lower level. Hot tub was pristine and very large.
We fished the fully stocked pond and was not disappointed. It should be noted that there is a significant slope from the cabin to the dock making it difficult for some older people. Would recommend steps for easier accessibility. We saw foxes, deer, and heard lots of bull frogs during our stay. Defiantly recommend this cabin and look forward to staying there in the future.
Excellent location, very nice space, equipped very well!
I enjoyed my stay at Sandy's place. It's a very quiet town with laid back people who are friendly. The apartment had all of the amenities that were mentioned and looked exactly like the pics.
Peaceful place,was perfect for my needs!
The Airbnb was as described. Sandra answered my inquiries quickly.
Sandra is a great host, easy to get in contact and very helpful. The place is nice and quiet. I would definitely stay again. Thank you Sandra for a great place.

very nice and interesting house.
Also very comfortable
Very large, plenty of space. Lovely area of town.

Even better than the pictures! Amazing stay and we can't wait to return. The place is spacious, cozy, and thoughtfully appointed. Location is convenient, parking is easy, and we felt right at home. Thank so much you, Carol, for giving us a memorable time in a town that means a lot to us!
Beautiful old house, the rooms are decorated in nice period theme. Very comfortable, and the location is convenient to downtown.

A lovely visit. We felt very at home. The home was absolutely beautiful and historic. Our only complaints were we were unable to light the fireplace in the bedroom..user error?...and we enjoyed ourselves too much and didn't want to leave!
Beautiful house that will take you back in time.

Great location relative to downtown Cambridge. Guests should know that ground floor bedroom is right on the street. If you're a light sleeper or might be woken up by street noise/ light this probably isn't the place for you. Blackout curtains would certainly help. Unit is large (significantly larger than a nearby hotel option) and has lots of character. We appreciated the seasonal decor but the snow covered steps/sidewalk and frozen shower pipes (shower would not drain during our entire stay) certainly detracted from the experience. The host informed us over the phone that with the with the warmer weather coming later that the pipes were likely to thaw and that a handyman would come by to check the pipes after we left. Great for the plumbing, not great if you've driven 300+miles and are hoping to take a shower during your stay. Would consider staying again, but perhaps in warmer weather.
Beautiful place. In walking distance of the downtown. Highly recommend.
A beautiful place to stay. Definitely a repeat.
Charming historic suite… we immediately felt like we were stepping back in time! Thank you for sharing the space and experience!

This is a spacious gorgeous historical home with so many details in the decor and woodwork. The location is perfect for a short walk to downtown Cambridge. The home was immaculately clean with a fully stocked kitchen utensils and serving ware.
I would caution that the bathtub is a step in clawfoot that is curved throughout the bottom. There is no flat space to stand comfortably.
We enjoyed our stay! Nice and clean!
This was absolutely perfect! The space was large, clean and so incredibly inviting. I can't wait to return.

I enjoyed staying in the Downton Abbey suite. The place is lovely and was comfortable. The charm of the city was a pleasant surprise. Fireplace in the bedroom, living room, dining room and the kitchen!
the most charming home I've stayed at so far. location is perfect and right next to some convenient places, like a church, stores and food. will 100% be going back.
Great area ! House was beautiful and clean. I would definitely stay again

The Downton Abbey Suite was a comfortable, unique, and peaceful property and I loved staying there. Carol had excellent communication and was helpful and immediately available when I initially had trouble getting into the unit when I first arrived. A+ stay with thoughtful touches such as complementary chocolates.

The Downton Abby Suite is just perfect. We visited Cambridge during the holidays. The home is located right in downtown so we were able to walk and enjoy the town’s Christmas displays, light show and do some shopping. Highly recommend.
Great place to stay! Every attention to detail was made. You feel like you have stepped back in time with all the period decor. Would definitely stay again!

Lovely accommodations in a great location within walking distance of everything Christmas in downtown Cambridge! Plenty of shopping and restaurants amidst all of the Dickens characters. We especially loved the beautifully lit Christmas tree that perfectly complemented the lovely and so warming gas fireplace in the master suite!
Downton Abbey is a nicely appointed suite that will take you back in time. This is a great place in a nice neighborhood.

This was the first time we have stayed in an Airbnb in the US and it was terrific. The apartment is very clean, spacious, and decorated in a unique way with a lot of attention to detail - like a movie set. It was stocked with coffee, tea, water, chocolate bars, and lovely bath gels. It is very close to Salt Fork Lake which is a great place to walk around. We would love to stay here again!
Very neat historical home
This place was even more spacious than what we thought it would be! Great historic home that was very clean! If we traveled to the area again, we would definitely stay again.
The house was super cute and Carols instructions were super easy to follow. If we are ever back in the area we would stay here again.

This is a lovely and large apartment with a private entry and Victorian decor just steps from Cambridge's main street. The host has updated this older home with both modern (kitchen, tv) and period touches (wainscoting, tin ceiling, clawfoot tub). The towels were thick and new and there were bottles of water and coffee available. If ever in Cambridge, I would stay here again.
A beautiful and cozy suite. Great location in Cambridge, easy walk to restaurants and shops. I would definitely stay again.

The pictures don’t even do this place justice. I am a big lover of history and old buildings, and this place has it all. Being the first house built in the town of Cambridge, this home has a ton of history! After my husband and I had a few challenging moments trying to get ourselves in with the keypad, it was all smooth sailing from there. (for this particular suite, enter the code and hit the LOCK button, since there is no “unlock” button) Our only regret is we wished we could have stayed longer. Spotless inside, great attention to detail, comfy bed, and wonderful to soak in the tub. My family was jealous that we scored this wonderful AirBNB.

We stayed at Carol's place again on our return trip--worked out well. We had another lovely dinner in the antique-filled dining room, and then watched the Olympics on the TV in the living room. The best of both the 19th and 21st centuries!
Highly recommended, especially if you are looking for a safe way to travel during the pandemic. Near the highway, socially distant, you can make your own meals, and very comfortable and elegant!

This is a great place to stay, 5 minutes off the interstate. It was perfect during the pandemic—quiet and self-contained with a full kitchen. And so beautifully decorated with antiques, including a lovely dining room. A great choice if you are traveling through central Ohio!

Carol’s Downton Abbey Suite is incredibly beautiful and was perfect for my weekend getaway. The accommodations are so comfy and I felt as if I’d stepped back in time.
It was quiet, private and was very easy to park and the keypad check in was very convenient.
I highly recommend The Downton Abbey Suite to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend getaway.
I’m already planning a return trip!!

We had seen the picture on AirBnB of this Downton Abbey Suite, but when we opened the door and walked in - we were still "wow'd". My husband and I were travelling for 2.5 weeks staying in 5 different areas - and this was our 3rd of 5 stays. We rotate between historic hotels and AirBnBs and it was awesome to find an AirBnB that was also historical. Carol has paid attention to the details that matter when you are in a home away from home. The linens and towels are top notch (and plenty of towels). She left us two delicious blueberry muffins from the local Kennedy's bakery, Great instructions for accessing the WiFi and cable TV. A large kitchen trash can. Coffee and individual creamers - just nice touches like that. The location was perfect with just a block or two to walk to several different dining options (although we had a kitchen, so we did cook for ourselves one night). This is a safe neighborhood. We had a small issue when entering the code to get into the apartment when we first arrived. I called her number and she responded immediately and we were in (we had to pull the door snug toward us as the lock was catching - no big deal). We also called her when we left to let her know and she was right there. There is so much to do and see in this area - and you can't go wrong with this place. Very special! We don't normally vacation in the same place twice, but if we are ever back in Cambridge - we'll be staying here.
Adorable place, like stepping back in time; Carol the host was wonderful, great communication; and great location to walk around town.

The cabin was quiet and isolated as described. Kelly was very communicative and did reach out to ask how everything was.
However, the cabin itself was not what we expected. There were many bugs (between me and my wife we killed at least 15 and found several more dead moths on window sills etc). Millipedes, spiders, stink bugs, etc.
The cabin also had a very strong order that smelled almost like trying to cover up a smell. We had to wash everything we brought with us to remove the smell.
Before we booked we had chatted with the host and she said the cabin sustained damage from a storm but repairs would be completed a month before our stay. When we stayed the ceiling was half painted, there were cracks in the drywall and molding was missing in a couple rooms. I'm not sure if this was related to storm damage or not.
Additionally, we briefly tried to turn on the TV/DVD player and found the TV didn't work. The picture color was distorted and the TV did not have working sound.
We had to leave our stay early for personal reasons, and Kelly did offer us a refund, however we did not cancel our last day and I don't think it's fair to deny the host our rental when we left unexpectedly early.
Kelly did ask during our stay if everything was ok with the cabin, however we didn't explain the issues. There was nothing anyone could reasonably do to fix a dirty, smelly bug filled cabin in a day. I did tell her the TV wasn't working, but she had no comment on that.

We were running ahead of schedule and asked if our Air Bnb would be ready a half hour early. Kelly said she was in Texas and her daughter was cleaning and would let me know when it was ready. Check-in time is listed as 3:00 but she did not let me know it was ready until 3:32. All other properties we have stayed in gave us the lockbox code for the key 24 hours ahead of time, but it wasn't until I asked for it that morning that it was provided to us (I like to know ahead of check-in in case I don't have signal, etc.).
Prior to booking, I read reviews and many stated 4-wheel drive is necessary to get up the driveway. We do not have a vehicle with that ability so we I messaged Kelly to ask if that really was needed and she said it was not. Then when she responded to my question about the lockbox code, she said she recommends 4 wheel drive. Getting up the driveway was a pretty scary experience, and I should have listened to the reviews. It's very steep, has a couple sharp turns, and has several ruts. I wasn't sure if we were going to make it up. Coming downhill was easier, but we scraped the bottom of our car. From that point on we just parked at the bottom of the driveway and walked up and down.
Underneath the porch there were old mattresses, several bags of trash, and other junk. The walkway to the door was blocked by a pile of firewood that had fallen over. The home has a wrap-around porch which was the only thing we actually enjoyed about the property. Although the porch table was filthy and we had to clean it off. There was a cooler on the porch full of rain water and a wheelbarrow by the fire pit was also full of rain water.
Inside, there were bugs everywhere we looked. The floor, walls, ceiling, curtains, furniture, etc. Mostly millipedes but also ants, stink bugs, and other insects. I live in the country so I'm used to some bugs getting in, but this was disgusting. We wore shoes the entire time because we were stepping on a bug every time we turned around. The walls had paint peeling off, cobwebs on ceiling fans, there were food particles in the sink, the master bedroom closet door was falling apart, there was hair in the bathroom sink, shower, and floor, black spots on the inside of the shower curtain (likely mold), a moth and other bugs in the dryer, and the place was all-over dirty and not kept up with well.
Upon opening the fridge we found a case of beer with an empty bottle, and a lunch bag of tuna pouches and a container of leftover hamburgers. There was also a pasta strainer in the freezer(?).
I have sensitivities to fragrances so I requested room sprays and air freshener plug-ins not to be used, as well as our sheets and towels washed in free & clear detergent. As far as I could tell, our sheets and some of the towels were (some still had fragrance), but there were four air-wick plug-ins throughout the house, which was irritating.
At this point, we were looking for other Air Bnb's or VRBO's to stay in. Unfortunately for us there were none available in the area that short of notice, and we would have left to stay in a hotel, had it not been for the cooler of food we brought that needed to be kept refrigerated.
The burners on the stove are very uneven, which made cooking frustrating, but doable. Some of the cooking utensils definitely should be replaced, for instance there was a plastic spoon that had pieces of plastic coming off, and a pot with the coating scratched up. There were enough utensils/cooking equipment for what I needed, but none of it was great quality and it was a pretty random assortment. The coffee maker was also dirty and had old grounds in it, and the kitchen trash can still had trash in it.
The bed was decently comfortable, but when I stripped the bed before we left, I found a ton of little hairs at the foot of the fitted sheet.
Maybe this was just a one-off because of the other good reviews, but we didn't feel like we could relax at all because of the unkemptness of the home and property. We tried to spend as little time as possible at the home and have never been so relieved to check-out. I do not take leaving negative reviews lightly as I truly try to see things in a positive light and help hosts out by leaving good reviews, but we did not enjoy our stay and can't believe we paid money to stay here. I would not recommend this Air Bnb to anyone.
